pullRequest.title: chore: Remove core module line-up
pullRequest.bodyText:
As discussed in the stabilization workstream we are going to remove all non-essential modules from the engine's modules folder and move/split them to respective stand-alone modules.
New Module Line-up

Code and assets have moved to different repositories. Some were split, some merged, and some just moved to a new home.

⤴ https://github.com/Terasology/CoreAdvancedAssets
✳ https://github.com/Terasology/CoreAssets
🚚  https://github.com/Terasology/CoreSampleGameplay
⤴ https://github.com/Terasology/CoreWorlds
⤴ https://github.com/Terasology/Debugging
⤴ https://github.com/Terasology/Drops
⤴ https://github.com/Terasology/Explosives
⤴ https://github.com/Terasology/Furnishings
🚚 https://github.com/Terasology/BiomesAPI

Two modules should be deprecated:

❌ Terasology/CoreBlocks
❌ Terasology/CoreItems

✳ extended ⤴ extracted 🚚 moved ❌ deprecated
Related PRs
Closes #3922
Closes #3926
Closes #3925
Affects #3904

-* CoreSampleGameplay - gameplay front for Core - allows modules to depend on Core without the default starting inventory
+* [CoreSampleGameplay](https://github.com/Terasology/CoreSampleGameplay) - default gameplay with a few core modules enabled
